basics.name: Mainak Mondal
basics.title: PhD Researcher — Autonomous Robotics & Networked Systems
basics.summary: Autonomy researcher building and shipping full-stack robotic systems. Focused on reinforcement learning schedulers, CARLA/ROS orchestration, and resilient V2X connectivity for ground and aerial robots.

experience.organization: University of Connecticut — Cyber-Physical Systems Laboratory
highlights: Designed and deployed MIND-CAVs, a browser-based CARLA orchestration system with LLM-assisted intent generation, FastAPI backend, React dashboard, and WebRTC streaming for closed-loop autonomy experiments.
Built autonomous driving features on F1Tenth and QCar robots using ROS on Nvidia Jetson TX2, delivering lane keeping, obstacle avoidance, SLAM, and autonomous waypoint following.
Integrated open-source 5G stacks (OpenAirInterface, SRSRAN) on robotic platforms to enable low-latency V2V/V2I communication.
Developed a reinforcement-learning charge-scheduling agent for mobile chargers in wireless powered communication networks, increasing sensor survival by ~20% while reducing travel distance by 5%.
Implemented autonomy on TurtleBot3 with ROS, including obstacle avoidance, SLAM, and waypoint following with a streamlined deployment pipeline.

experience.organization: NR Tomsk State University — High Performance Reconfigurable Systems Lab
highlights: Built zero-trust long-range UAV control using ROS, MAVLink, Lightbridge, and ZeroTier for intercontinental operations.
Engineered infrared-guided multirotor UAV landing for GPS-denied environments, improving landing precision by ~40% on mobile pads.
Designed great-circle return-to-home control using PX4Flow for fail-safe navigation in GNSS-denied settings.
Developed medical/emergency delivery drones with automated payload handling during COVID-19.
Created an autonomous scout/attack UAV with radar-based threat detection and AlexNet-based interception, plus a ruggedized scout tank for hazardous environments.
Delivered APIs for the MEAN stack platform and optimized a hybrid Ionic app, cutting load times by 300%.
Partnered with clients to gather requirements, design mockups, and deliver tailored features end-to-end.
Redesigned a plant complaint management system for the web, improving accessibility and enterprise integration.
Built the system with a C# backend and ASP.NET frontend following SOLID principles and integrated with inventory and general management tools.

projects.title: MIND-CAVs CARLA Orchestration
projects.impact: Closed-loop CARLA autonomy with LLM intent, web telemetry, and dataset capture.
details: Browser-based orchestration of CARLA scenarios with intent generation via LLM prompts and guardrails.
FastAPI control plane with scenario authoring, safety checks, and dataset export hooks.
React dashboard with live WebRTC streaming, telemetry overlays, and scenario control widgets.
Designed for rapid experiment iteration and reproducible autonomy benchmarks.

projects.title: DQN+ Charge Scheduling Agent
projects.impact: Boosted wireless sensor uptime by ~20% while cutting charger travel by 5%.
details: Trained a DQN-based agent to route mobile chargers across wireless powered sensor networks.
Modeled energy dynamics and mobility costs to balance coverage and efficiency.
Delivered survivability gains with reduced travel overhead; deployable with ROS hooks.

projects.title: Infrared-Guided UAV Precision Landing
projects.impact: Improved autonomous landing accuracy by ~40% in GPS-denied settings.
details: Infrared beacon-guided landing routine for multirotor UAVs in GNSS-denied zones.
Combined PX4Flow sensing with great-circle approach planning for safety.
Prototype validated on mobile landing pads with higher precision.
related: Program for Precise Landing of an Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Using Infrared Beacons (FIPS Certificate #2021610731)

projects.title: Autonomous Scout/Attack UAV & Ruggedized Tank
projects.impact: Radar-triggered threat detection with AlexNet interception and a rugged scout tank for hazardous terrain.
details: Designed a radar-based threat detection system that activates autonomous scan routines.
Implemented AlexNet-based CV pipeline for aerial threat interception with a net-gun mechanism.
Built a rugged scout tank for search-and-rescue in radiation-affected, rough terrain with heavy payload support.

projects.title: Fail-Safe Navigation in GNSS-Denied Environments
projects.impact: Great-circle return-to-home and PX4Flow-based guidance for resilient UAV navigation.
details: Developed great-circle control logic to return UAVs safely when GNSS drops.
Fused PX4Flow optical flow with inertial data for short-range odometry.
Hardened behavior for autonomous recovery and landing on mobile pads.

projects.title: 5G RAN Dashboard (srsRAN & OpenAirInterface)
projects.impact: Unified telemetry and control panel for lab-scale 5G RAN experiments.
details: Aggregated KPIs and logs from srsRAN/OpenAirInterface into a single dashboard.
Provided controls for rapid reconfiguration of radio parameters during trials.
Built for low-latency observability to support V2X and robotics experiments.
